title: Emerald Grandeur: Diamond and Emerald Layered Necklace - Chandravanshi Haar
materials: this necklace features meticulously set dazzling FG color diamonds and boasts a striking contrast with 11.53 carats of vibrant emeralds. The gold features a lustrous finish.
features: This layered haaram features a delicate floral motif composed of individually set diamonds, creating a cascading effect. Square cut emerald accents create focal points, adding depth and luxury. The multiple layers are designed to sit gracefully on the neckline. The design blends traditional South Indian sensibilities with modern aesthetics.
colors: Primarily white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) with the subtle sheen of white gold.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal for muhurtham
or any event where a statement piece is desired.
description: This necklace is a testament to timeless elegance and meticulous craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds ensures lasting value and brilliance. The layered design is both striking and sophisticated, guaranteed to turn heads. It's a modern take on a traditional Haaram, blending cultural heritage with contemporary style.
